mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECRUIT(RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL) VALUES(#{recruit_code}, #{corp_id}, #{recruit_title}, #{job_type}, #{recruit_contents}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{personnel}, #{job_rank}, #{emp_type}, #{app_type}, #{app_count}, #{job_local})
